title: 7. Two Book Authors and a Microphone
description: The next chapter in the adventures of Dubner and Levitt has begun. Listen to a preview of what's to come for the fall season of Freakonomics Radio.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
